alert.note: Alert for Denton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 19 at 5:03PM CDT until September 19 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Denton County in north central Texas... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 503 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles west of Sanger, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Denton, The Colony, Corinth, Sanger, Little Elm, Krum, Pilot Point, Shady Shores, Aubrey, Krugerville, Cross Roads, Ray Roberts Park Isle Du Bois, Ray Roberts Park Johnson Branch, Oak Point, Ponder, Lakewood Village, Lincoln Park, Providence Village, Stony, and Lake Ray Roberts. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
